ðŸ§© Sudoku Rules

  • Each row must contain the numbers 1 to 9, with no duplicates.
  • Each column must contain the numbers 1 to 9, with no duplicates.
  • Each 3Ã—3 subgrid must contain the numbers 1 to 9, with no duplicates.
  • Use logic â€” no guessing is needed for a valid puzzle.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SudokuGeneratorService } from 'src/app/service/sudoku-generator.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sudoku-solver', templateUrl: './sudoku-solver.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sudoku-solver.component.scss'], }) export class SudokuSolverComponent implements OnInit { sudokugrid: any; startSudokuGame: boolean = false; constructor(private sudokuGeneratorService: SudokuGeneratorService) {} ngOnInit() { this.generatenewSudoku(); } generatenewSudoku() { this.sudokugrid = this.sudokuGeneratorService.generateSudoku(); } printOutput(result: any) { alert(result); } startGame() { this.startSudokuGame = true; } }
